verbs.description: [V: reclaiming] [ARG1: the american prairie efforts] [ARGM-PRP: to preserve our nation iconic grasslands] are coming into conflict with cattle ranchers who say such land reclamation endangers their way of life conni french alison fox american prairie reserve amazon prairie barry petersen technicolor sari aviv martha kauffman american prairie foundation
